articles.title: 官方：阿维塔07老用户将通过OTA升级至华为乾崑ADS 4和鸿蒙5_手机网易网
articles.author: 凤凰网科技
articles.summary: Avatr is launching the 2026 Avatr 07 model, which will feature Huawei's ADS 4 and HarmonyOS 5. Existing Avatr 07 owners will be able to upgrade their vehicles with features like a sport suspension, driver assistance lights, 4D millimeter-wave radar, and an ultra-HD wide-angle electronic interior rearview mirror. The new model will also have a 52 kWh CATL battery, providing a CLTC range of 333 km.

articles.title: SK hynix Begins Supplying Mobile NAND Solution ZUFS 4.1
articles.author: PRNEWSWIRE
articles.summary: SK hynix has begun mass production and supply of its high-performance mobile NAND solution, ZUFS 4.1, to customers. The ZUFS 4.1 enhances smartphone's on-device AI capabilities, offering improved speed, data management, and error-handling compared to previous versions. It reduces app launch times by 45% and AI app launch times by 47%.

articles.title: SK hynix Begins Supplying Mobile NAND Solution ZUFS 4.1
articles.author: SK hynix Inc
articles.summary: SK hynix Inc. has begun supplying its high-performance mobile NAND solution ZUFS 4.1 to customers, marking the world's first mass production of this solution. This solution significantly improves sustained performance compared to conventional UFS, reducing app launch time by 45% and is optimized for on-device AI and large-scale data processing.

articles.title: Analyzing Regional Date Availability: A Content Writer's Insight
articles.summary: In 2023, a tech company launched a new product globally. Initial reports showed lower engagement in Australia and New Zealand due to incorrect date formatting in campaign materials. Correcting the date format and adding time zone information resulted in a 30% engagement increase in those regions.

articles.title: Ultimum Limited empowers local suppliers, boosts business
articles.author: Arinze Nwafor
articles.summary: Ultimum Limited launched its new soft drink brand, Razzl, in Aba, Nigeria, targeting the South-East and South-South markets. The launch event showcased the brand's personality and aimed to create business opportunities for trade partners. Ultimum Limited plans to expand to other commercial hubs like Port Harcourt, Asaba, and Enugu.

articles.title: Zoom recognized in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Contact Center as a Service for the first time  Sep. 10, 2025 23:15
articles.summary: Zoom Communications, Inc. has been recognized in the 2025 Gartner Magic Quadrant for Contact Center as a Service (CCaaS), just three years after launching Zoom Contact Center in 2022. This recognition highlights Zoom's AI-first approach to customer experience, where AI is embedded in the platform. Zoom believes this validates their AI-first platform strategy.

articles.title: Beloved Beverage Brand Unveils the Unexpected Flavor Collab You Didn't See Coming
articles.author: Kelly Bryant
articles.summary: AriZona has launched a new flavor, Chocolate Egg Cream Soda, in collaboration with the Tunnel To Towers Foundation. A portion of the proceeds will benefit the foundation. The new soda is available at select retailers nationwide and online at DrinkAriZona.com.

articles.title: Google's Pixel 10 is all about AI
articles.author: Jonathan Castillo
articles.summary: Google has announced the Pixel 10 series, which includes the Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, Pixel 10 XL, and Pixel 10 Pro Fold. These phones feature the Tensor G5 chip for improved AI processing and battery efficiency, enabling features like real-time live translations via Gemini Nano. Other features include Magic Cue for quick information retrieval and Pixelsnap for Qi2 wireless charging.

articles.title: Polestar unveils Polestar 5 Grand Tourer, starting from $171,000
articles.author: Joshua S. Hill
articles.summary: Polestar has unveiled its new Polestar 5 four-door performance Grand Tourer, expected to be delivered in the spring of 2026, and priced from $171,100. Launch editions are already on sale in Australia, and the Polestar 5 boasts features like 800V architecture for faster charging and a range of up to 670 kilometers.

articles.title: Ditch the chemicals: Clean beauty starts with Golden Jojoba Oil
articles.author: Tags
articles.summary: Health Ranger Store has launched Health Ranger Select Organic Golden Jojoba Oil, a lab-verified product for purity and bottled in the U.S.A. The product is designed as a versatile skin care product that mimics the skin's natural oil to cleanse, protect, and rejuvenate, and is also non-GMO, China-free, USDA-organic and glyphosate-tested.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE, Galaxy Tab S11, and Samsung's Galaxy AI Crusade
articles.author: Ewan Spence
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Tab S11 and Tab S11 Ultra tablets, along with the Galaxy S25 FE smartphone, all equipped with Galaxy AI. The Galaxy S25 FE introduces the full Galaxy AI experience to the lowest-priced Galaxy S model, while the Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra brings Galaxy AI and the Android ecosystem to a desktop experience. These releases aim to expand the user base of Galaxy AI to 400 million by the end of 2025.

articles.title: Emerging brands push seasoning innovation
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: Smaller companies are introducing new blends. These launches are taking place within a competitive market.

articles.title: Google Launches New Ad Tools for Retailers
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: Google has unveiled new AI-powered ad tools, including AI-generated ad integration and enhanced content generation features within Google Ads app, such as product image and video creation. Additionally, YouTube masthead ads are now shoppable, offering an alternative to promote and sell products via YouTube ads.

articles.title: Taco Bell Is Now Serving 'Grande' Portions of This Classic Menu Item–But Only For a ...
articles.author: The Capital Journal
articles.summary: Taco Bell has introduced new menu items at its locations nationwide. These new items offer double the protein compared to similar existing options.

articles.title: Papa John's croissant pizza debuts in US for only one day - Here's how to ...
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: Papa John's is introducing the Croissant Pizza in America. The pizza is characterized by its flaky and buttery crust.

articles.title: Does Dollar General sell fresh produce in NJ? Where to find a DG Market
articles.author: Damon C. Williams
articles.summary: Dollar General is offering fresh fruits and vegetables at its DG Market stores and a selection of its larger traditional stores in New Jersey. DG Market aims to provide affordable ingredients for balanced meals, covering about 80% of common produce categories. Shoppers can locate DG Market stores through the Dollar General website.

articles.title: One of Google's new Pixel 10 AI features has already been removed
articles.summary: Google launched the Pixel 10 series with over 20 new AI experiences. One of these experiences, the Daily Hub, was subsequently removed due to limited functionality. The Pixel 10 launch demonstrates Google's focus on generative AI technology.

articles.title: Large Operator Launches Free Content Writer Tool Without Commentaries
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: A major telecommunications operator has launched a free AI content writer tool, offering features like multiple content types, keyword integration, tone selection, length control, plagiarism checker, and multi-language support. The tool is accessible via a dedicated webpage and supports blog posts, articles, social media captions, product descriptions, email copy, and website content. This launch could be a large-scale beta test or a way to collect data on user behavior and content preferences.

articles.title: The Birth of a New Era for Powdered Cocktail Mixers – [your]NEWS
articles.author: Bettina Paus
articles.summary: CYN'S MIX has launched a line of crafted cocktail mixers designed for accessibility and gourmet quality. The mixers are made with premium ingredients and offer a range of flavors, appealing to both classic and adventurous cocktail enthusiasts. These mixers aim to provide convenient yet authentic cocktail experiences.

articles.title: Do you clean your AirPods? This $10 tool is 'perfect' for de-gunking headphones
articles.author: Kayla Kuefler
articles.summary: Amazon shoppers are praising the Hagibis Cleaning Kit, a 3-in-1 cleaning pen designed for AirPods and other wireless earbuds.  The kit features a flocking sponge, a brush, and a metal tip to remove dust, dirt, and gunk. With a solid 4.4-star rating, customers are reporting it brings their earbuds 'back to life'.

articles.title: The 7 best white noise machines we swear by for uninterrupted sleep
articles.author: Emma Sutton-Williams
articles.summary: The article reviews several white noise machines designed to improve sleep quality. Highlighted products include the SNOOZ Smart White Noise Sound Machine, Dreamegg Baby Sound Machine, Ozlo Sleepbuds, Hatch Restore 3 Sunrise Alarm Clock, HoMedics SoundSleep White Noise Sound Machine, Magicteam Sound Machine, and LectroFan High Fidelity White Noise Machine, each offering unique features like customizable sounds, portable designs, and specific uses for babies, adults, and even dogs. Ozlo Sleepbuds are designed to block out snoring.

articles.title: Taco Bell Is Testing Several New Menu Items in 3 Major Cities This Month–Here's Exactly Where
articles.author: The Capital Journal
articles.summary: Test items, described as 'bold' and 'zesty', were quietly launched earlier this week.

articles.title: Hershey Releases 3 'Bold' New Flavors of 'Larger Than Life' Fan-Favorite Candy
articles.author: The Capital Journal
articles.summary: In 2024, Hershey's launched a new sweets product that was considered their '#1 sweets launch of the year'.

articles.title: Olay to address aging concerns with 7-in-1 serum
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: Apple launched the iPhone 15, featuring an A17 Bionic chip, a 48MP camera, and a USB-C port. Apple also launched iCloud+ Premium, a 2TB cloud storage service with advanced security, priced at $9.99 per month. The iPhone 15 is available for pre-order on September 15th and ships on September 22nd; iCloud+ Premium is available now.

articles.title: Prime members save 46% on this cleaning time saver, plus extra coupon
articles.author: Emma Sutton-Williams
articles.summary: Leebein has launched the Electric Spin Scrubber, now available on Amazon with a 46% discount for Prime members. The scrubber features eight interchangeable brush heads, dual-speed cleaning, an adjustable handle, and water resistance, backed by a 2-year protection plan and a 90-day money-back guarantee.

articles.title: Windows developers can now publish apps to Microsoft's store without fees
articles.author: Tom Warren
articles.summary: Microsoft is removing onboarding fees for developers submitting apps to the Windows Store in nearly 200 countries. This initiative allows individual developers to publish apps with a personal Microsoft account, eliminating the previous one-time fees. This change aims to create a more accessible platform and encourage more developers to innovate and share their apps within the Windows ecosystem.

articles.title: Innovative Product WONZ ta-VNS Device Featured at IFA 2025
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: WONZ Technology introduced its ta-VNS Device at the IFA International Consumer Electronics Show. The ta-VNS Device is aimed at providing an innovative solution for sleep problems and enhancing overall wellness.

articles.title: 30 Practical Walmart Products For Your Adult Era
articles.author: Emily Shwake
articles.summary: The article features several new product introductions designed to solve everyday problems. These include an outlet-concealing extension cord, a spin scrubber for cleaning, a filtered showerhead, Pantene Pro-V Volume and Body Shampoo and a laundry cart for sorting clothes. Other products include a stud finder, a portable water flosser, a damp duster, a vanity organizer, a dishwasher cleaner, washing machine cleaner packets, cereal keepers, a cold brew maker, and a power bank.

articles.title: Google Unveils New AI Marketing Tools Ahead of Holiday Season
articles.author: Kathryn Lundstrom
articles.summary: Google is launching new AI-driven advertising tools, including the global beta release of AI Max, which allows brands to appear in AI search summaries. The company is also adding new features to YouTube, enabling advertisers to optimize campaigns based on channel and promote in-store offers, and introducing generative AI tools for building or changing product imagery within its asset and product studio platforms.

articles.title: NextCorps launches AI Startup Jam to turn ideas into working prototypes
articles.author: Andrea Deckert
articles.summary: NextCorps is hosting an AI Startup Jam from October 24-26, offering participants the opportunity to turn software startup ideas into functioning prototypes. Participants can pitch their software concepts for a chance to win cash prizes and in-kind services.

articles.title: AI Slop Has Shattered My Trust in Google Pixel Phones
articles.author: Bertel King
articles.summary: The Pixel 10 introduces new features like Magic Cue and 100x AI-enhanced zoom, alongside Pixel Snap for MagSafe accessories. A review of the Pixel 9 Pro features critique of the AI-driven Pixel Studio. Concerns are raised regarding the quality and accuracy of Google's AI tools overall.

articles.title: Papa Johns Is Giving out Free Croissant Pizzas — But Only Today
articles.author: Chrissy Callahan
articles.summary: Papa Johns is soft-launching a new Croissant Pizza in the U.S., initially offering it free to rewards members on September 10th. The Croissant Pizza, which debuted in the United Arab Emirates, features a 'crisp, light and layered bite through a buttery braided, gloriously flaky crust,' and allows customers to choose their own toppings.

articles.title: Verizon will give you an iPhone 17 Pro free with trade-in - here's what to know
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Apple has launched the iPhone 17. Verizon is offering both new and existing customers up to $1,100 off the new phones, along with free Apple Watch and iPad offers.

articles.title: Naijadrink.com Launches First Nigeria's Cheap Wholesale Online Liquor Store Site
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: naijadrink.com is officially launching its website today, December 15. The website aims to provide exceptional customer service and an extensive selection of products.

articles.title: Netradyne Celebrates 10th Anniversary with Cross-Country Customer Obsession Tour
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Netradyne launched its Customer Obsession Tour to celebrate its 10th anniversary. The tour showcases Netradyne's AI-powered platform for connected fleet performance and advanced video telematics technology.

articles.title: Here's everything you need to know about Samsung's Galaxy S25 FE, S11 Ultra and more
articles.author: Steve Vegvari
articles.summary: Samsung unveiled a refreshed lineup of devices at its late-summer Galaxy Unpacked event. The event was held just ahead of IFA 2025 in Berlin.

articles.title: McDonald's launches 'game-changing' burger as some fans 'fuming' with new menu addition
articles.author: Emily Parker
articles.summary: McDonald's has launched a new Sausage Sandwich nationwide as part of its Saver Menu. The breakfast item includes a pork sausage patty in a soft bun and is available for £1.99 individually or £2.99 as part of a bundle deal with a drink, and is only available until 11am.

articles.title: AI Startup Plans to Create 5,000 Podcasts, 3,000 Episodes a Week for $1 Each
articles.author: Paul Bois
articles.summary: Inception Point AI is launching a service to produce AI-generated podcasts, aiming for 3,000 episodes per week at a cost of $1 per episode. The Quiet Please Podcast Network already has over 5,000 shows and has seen 10 million downloads since September 2023, offering various content levels, including weather reports and subject-area podcasts hosted by AI personalities.

articles.title: Why Nithin Kamath Used Two Demat Accounts - And Why You Should, Too
articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: Zerodha has launched the option for its clients to open a secondary demat account. This provides an additional service to its existing user base.

articles.title: Papa Johns Brings Its Globally Celebrated Croissant Pizza to the U.S. — for One Day Only in Select Restaurants
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Papa Johns is launching the Croissant Pizza in the U.S., initially available exclusively to Papa Rewards members. This new pizza features a flaky, buttery crust and was first launched in the UAE. Papa Johns partnered with KidSuper to create a custom delivery bag for the Croissant Pizza, which debuted at Paris Fashion Week.

articles.title: Regulatory Sandboxes: Are They A Good Idea?
articles.author: Paulo Carvão
articles.summary: The Strengthening Artificial Intelligence Normalization and Diffusion By Oversight and eXperimentation Act (SANDBOX Act) directs the OSTP to establish a federal AI sandbox program, allowing companies to test AI products and services with temporary regulatory waivers. This program aims to promote innovation while ensuring safety and consumer protection through transparency and incident reporting.

articles.title: Asian ready meal brand Kitchen Joy adds starters and sides
articles.author: Niamh Leonard-Bedwell
articles.summary: Kitchen Joy has expanded its range with six new products, including 'air fryer-friendly' Krapow Chicken, Thai Green Curry Gyoza, Red Curry Spring Rolls, King Prawn Wonton Tom Yum Soup, Vegetable Pad Thai and Prawn Wonton Drunken Noodles. These products have been launched in Tesco freezers and are part of a £1.5m brand investment, including a social media and OOH campaign.

articles.title: Dyson's latest cordless vacuum handles long hair better than anything I've tried
articles.author: Lucy Smith
articles.summary: Dyson has launched the V16 Piston Animal Submarine vacuum cleaner, featuring a powerful Hyperdymium motor and innovative attachments designed to untangle hair and tackle wet spills. The vacuum includes a conical brush head, a 'cleancompaktor' for debris compression, and app functionality for session reports and maintenance alerts. The submarine attachment has a max mode to hydrate dried stains.

articles.title: 'I'm screaming' - Bullring shoppers thrilled as new store loved by Americans is revealed
articles.author: Kirsty Bosley
articles.summary: Bath and Body Works is opening its first Birmingham branch in the Bullring's East Mall next to Khaadi in October. Søstrene Grene will open a new location in Grand Central on September 19, offering free gifts to the first 100 customers.

articles.title: Nvidia hails 'another leap in the frontier of AI computing' with Rubin GPU launch
articles.author: Hellard
articles.summary: Nvidia has launched its Rubin series GPU, designed for AI inferencing and massive-context processing. The Rubin GPU will integrate with the Vera CPU within the Nvidia Vera Rubin NVL 144 CPX platform, offering 7.5x more AI performance than previous systems. The platform also promises 100TB of fast memory and 1.7 petabytes per second of memory bandwidth.

articles.title: Samsung Art Store Unveils Exclusive Vogue Collection for Luxury TV Displays
articles.summary: Samsung's Art Store launched an exclusive Vogue collection for its QLED, Neo QLED, and The Frame TVs. The Vogue collection features iconic covers, behind-the-scenes shots, editorial spreads, and dynamic digital art from Vogue's 130-year history, offering a constantly evolving gallery experience. Users can access the Art Store on select Samsung TVs, browse the Vogue collection, purchase artwork, and customize their display.

articles.title: Wayvia Appoints Theresa Pham as Head of Product to Accelerate AI-Native Commerce Strategy
articles.author: Wayvia
articles.summary: Wayvia appointed Theresa Pham as Head of Product to oversee the rollout of new AI-driven products. These products aim to broaden Wayvia's portfolio and empower brands with real-time commerce intelligence and control.

articles.title: Review: How does a €22 hairdryer compare to a €549 hairdryer?
articles.author: RTÉ Lifestyle
articles.summary: Dyson has launched the Supersonic r™ hair dryer, a premium product with fast drying capabilities and multiple accessories, priced at €549.99. Shark offers the SpeedStyle Pro 3-in-1 High-Velocity Hair Dryer at €209.99, a compact and fast-drying alternative. For a budget-friendly option, Tresemme provides the Fast Dry 2000 at €22, a compact and powerful dryer.

articles.title: Super-slim iPhones and stair-climbing robots, is tech getting exciting again?
articles.author: Spencer Hart
articles.summary: Apple launched the iPhone Air, a slim, titanium-clad phone reminiscent of the Razr. At IFA, innovative products like stair-climbing robot vacuums and humanoid robots were showcased, demonstrating a renewed ambition in tech product development. The focus is on novel designs and functionalities in newly introduced products.

articles.title: Apple's desperate attempt to mimic Google's success
articles.author: Jon Gilbert
articles.summary: Apple launched the iPhone 17 and iPhone Air, but the designs are criticized for copying Google's Pixel phones, specifically the camera bar. The Apple Intelligence AI is described as a poorly implemented mimicry of Google's Gemini. Google, with its Pixel 10, is attempting to deliver a user experience similar to what Apple once pioneered.

articles.title: Dyson's latest cordless vacuum handles long hair better than anything I've tried
articles.author: Lucy Smith
articles.summary: Dyson has launched the V16 Piston Animal, a new cordless vacuum cleaner featuring the powerful Hyperdymium motor. This new vacuum includes attachments designed to untangle hair and a wet cleaning head for removing stains on hard floors. It is priced at £899.

articles.title: Why Did Nike Do It?
articles.author: Mark Ritson
articles.summary: Nike is exploring a temporary alteration of its iconic slogan 'Just Do It' to 'Why Do It?' to rejuvenate the brand and appeal to a new generation. This strategic move aims to create attention, reinforce the brand's heritage, and modernize its image.

articles.title: AI+LIFE HACKS丨Grand Opening of Zhongshan Sam's Club Store - 新闻频道
articles.summary: Sam's Club opened a new store in Zhongshan on September 10th. The store features 3,000 to 4,000 differentiated products and has launched nearly 60 exclusive items "Originating from Zhongshan" or "Made in Zhongshan", along with several new products making their national debut at this location. Furthermore, members can purchase over 1,000 products via the Sam's Club app, with the fastest one-hour delivery service available in some areas.

articles.title: This Octopus Useless Box is the most adorable pointless gadget ever made
articles.author: Popkin
articles.summary: ROBOTSZ created the Octopus Useless Box, a handmade toy. This gadget features an octopus that reacts to the box opening by pushing levers and displaying different temperaments.

articles.title: Revieve Celebrates 2025 Milestones of Industry Recognition and AI Innovation, Preparing Brands for the Next Era of Beauty Growth
articles.author: Revieve
articles.summary: Perfect Corp has launched new AI-powered features and tools. The company's collaborations with brands like Paula's Choice on an AI-powered Skin Analyzer, BYOMA on Smart Skin Scan, and RoC Skincare on AI Skin Insight have gained industry recognition. These innovations reflect Perfect Corp's commitment to transforming the beauty experience through AI.

articles.title: M&S launches new sauce combining sweet and savoury flavours but shoppers divided
articles.author: Rahima Miah
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer (M&S) has launched a new Marmite and caramel sauce, a blend of sweet and salty flavors, priced at £3. M&S describes the sauce as a bold blend of smooth caramel and Marmite, suggesting it can be drizzled over ice cream or used as a dip for churros.

articles.title: Adobe Announces General Availability of AI Agents for Businesses to Transform Customer Experience Orchestration
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Adobe has launched AI agents powered by Adobe Experience Platform (AEP) Agent Orchestrator to enhance how businesses build and optimize customer experiences. These include Audience Agent, Journey Agent, Experimentation Agent, Data Insights Agent, Site Optimization Agent, and Product Support Agent. AEP Agent Composer provides a single interface for businesses to customize AI agents based on brand guidelines, organizational policy controls and more.

articles.title: Amazon hosed over $50 off this countertop dishwasher perfect for small home owners, renters, RV rovers and dorm room renegades
articles.author: Danielle Halibey
articles.summary: NOVETE has launched its Countertop Dishwasher, a space-saving appliance suitable for small apartments, RVs, and dorms. The dishwasher can hold four full place settings and features five wash cycles, including a Baby Care setting for sanitizing bottles. It is available on Amazon with a limited-time discount.

articles.title: ServiceNow Supercharges AI Adoption for Enterprises With Secure, Scalable AI Platform
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: ServiceNow launched its new Zurich platform release, featuring advancements in multi-agentic AI development, enterprise-wide AI platform security, and redesigned workflows. The release introduces intelligent developer tools for secure vibe coding using natural language and built-in security capabilities like ServiceNow Vault Console and Machine Identity Console. Autonomous workflows are also introduced, allowing for the integration of AI and human input.

articles.title: Hands-on: Nvidia's GeForce Now RTX 5080 is better and worse than I hoped
articles.author: Sean Hollister
articles.summary: Nvidia is introducing RTX 5080 graphics to its GeForce Now Ultimate cloud gaming service and is adding new features such as installable games and 360Hz mode for desktop monitors. The update enhances performance in games like Assassin's Creed Shadows and Cyberpunk 2077, showing gains over the older RTX 4080 servers. Also, the company launched 'Install-to-Play' feature, which increases the number of games playable on GeForce Now by letting users install any game that's opted into Valve's Steam Cloud Play.

articles.title: Hizero Unveils Industry-Shaking No-Suction H100 Handheld Hard Surface Cleaner at IFA 2025
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: Hizero introduced the H100 Handheld Hard Surface Cleaner at IFA 2025. The new cleaner combines proprietary No-Suction Technology with a high-absorbent Multi-Roller.

articles.title: How Agentic AI Can Accelerate Wireless And Fiber Network Rollouts
articles.author: Abhishek Singh
articles.summary: Amdocs' executive, Abhishek Singh, discusses how agentic AI can revolutionize telecom network deployments. Agentic AI streamlines workflows by using real-time adaptability and contextual intelligence in the deployment lifecycle. The new AI technology promises faster, smarter, and more cost-effective deployments by automating tasks such as site analysis, synchronization of resources, and validation of configurations.

articles.title: Analysis: Will the iPhone Air be enough to excite consumers?
articles.summary: Apple is launching the iPhone Air, a sleeker version of its flagship iPhone, designed to be subtle and 'disappear in your hands.' The company hopes this new product will excite consumers in a market where many phones look similar.

articles.title: New iPhone is here and it is time again for the Holy War
articles.summary: Apple launches new iPhone models annually, featuring iterative improvements such as enhanced cameras and chipsets.  Android phones also offer upgraded features, and new Android phones come with different configurations. Apple controls the iPhone ecosystem, while Android ecosystem has greater flexibility for the users.

articles.title: Sigma Reveals New AI, BI, and Analytics Features, Redefining Data Exploration Capabilities for Customers
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Sigma unveiled a suite of new features designed to empower users with a new path from insight to action at scale. The release includes upgrades to Sigma's AI-enabled features, new data app tools to automate actions, instant insight delivery with Sigma Reveal, advanced reporting, and the debut of Sigma Tenants. These updates aim to enhance data access, content, and governance across internal and embedded use cases.

articles.title: 'I shopped in Tesco and was floored when I spotted price of everyday item'
articles.author: Jess Flaherty
articles.summary: Colgate's Max White Ultimate Whitening Toothpaste (75ml) is priced at £9.95, reduced from £23 at Tesco. Oral-B's 3D White Clinical Intensive Whitening Radiant White (75ml) is half price at £10, down from £20. Colgate Max White StainLift Whitening Toothpaste (75ml) costs £16 at full price but is currently on offer for £8.

articles.title: LG Brings Seamless, Evolving Smart Home Experiences to Europe With Thinq Ai
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: LG Electronics introduced its AI platform, LG ThinQ AI, to the European smart home appliance market. The unveiling occurred during IFA 2025, marking a new era for LG in the smart home sector.

articles.title: Tandem Foods Opens New California Facility, Becomes Largest Wafer Bar Manufacturer in the U.S.
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Tandem Foods has successfully launched its first manufacturing line at its new Cypress, California facility, marking the largest investment in the company's 40-year history. The new line will focus on producing high-quality wafer bars, increasing Tandem Foods' capacity by over 150% and making them the largest wafer manufacturer in the U.S.

articles.title: I Ditched My Luxury Fragrance for This Under-$100 Skin Scent—And I've Never Received More Compliments
articles.author: Samantha Holender
articles.summary: NOYZ has launched a new perfume called "Only Human", priced at $85. The fragrance is a skin scent with woody, amber, and vanilla notes, available in 50mL, 15mL travel size, and solid perfume formats. Reviewers praise its long-lasting power and unique profile.

articles.title: When AI Runs Campaigns and Loyalty Goes Borderless
articles.author: BE Staff
articles.summary: Former Flipkart executive Ranjith Boyanapalli launched an AI-powered shopping assistant. Microsoft is also set to buy AI from Anthropic, marking a shift from OpenAI.

articles.title: Why are there dildos everywhere in 'Cyberpunk 2077'' It's a bug that's being addressed, the game's developer says. (OTGLY)
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: CD Projekt Red is addressing a bug in Cyberpunk 2077 concerning the overabundance of sex toys. The company plans to adjust their placement to be more contextually appropriate and less distracting in future updates.

articles.title: South Cheshire family firm seeks Nantwich business partner to expand Eco Dry Cleaning
articles.author: Ryan Parker
articles.summary: Sunrise Laundry Services is expanding its eco-friendly laundry and dry cleaning services to Nantwich by seeking a local business partner to act as a drop-off and collection point. This move aims to provide Nantwich residents with greener garment care and support local independent retail, offering the partner business additional income and customers.

articles.title: Shoppers say 'cut it out' as M&S releases controversial twist on classic sauce
articles.author: Emily Parker
articles.summary: M&S launched a new Marmite and caramel sauce, a controversial addition to their Marmite range. Additionally, M&S introduced a frozen version of their popular Colin the Caterpillar cake, an update to their existing product line.

articles.title: Grandiose launches AI-Powered ‘GrandChef' for smarter shopping
articles.author: Joy Chakravarty
articles.summary: Grandiose Supermarket, supported by Microsoft technology, launched GrandChef, an AI-powered chef within its Android and iOS apps. GrandChef provides recommendations based on recipes, dietary preferences, and cooking inspirations, aiming to create smarter and more personalized shopping experiences for customers.

articles.title: Penang Road Famous Teochew Cendol Opens First Outlet In Taiwan
articles.author: Tamara Jayne
articles.summary: Penang Chendul, known for its Malaysian shaved ice dessert, has launched its first international outlet in Taipei, Taiwan on September 1st. Located at the Far Eastern SOGO Taipei Fuxing Store, the stall offers Signature Chendul, Penang White Curry Mee, and Steamed Rice Roll.

articles.title: ‘I wish I'd invented the jet engine': James Dyson answers Telegraph Recommended reader questions
articles.author: Hannah Mendelsohn
articles.summary: Dyson is launching several new products, including the Dyson Spot+Scrub Ai robot vacuum in early 2026, featuring AI-powered stain detection and a self-emptying dock. They are also introducing the Dyson PencilVac, a slim vacuum, and the V16 Piston Animal stick vacuum with a dust compactor and anti-tangle head.

articles.title: Gordon Ramsay's secret to cooking best burger comes before you've even unpackaged it
articles.author: Sophie Grubb
articles.summary: Burger King has launched a new premium burger called 'The Wagyu', a first-of-its-kind offering at fast food chains priced at £11. It features 100% British beef wagyu and is topped with various ingredients like caramelised onions and caramelised onion mayo in a brioche bun. The Wagyu is available at Burger King UK nationwide from September 9 for a limited time.

articles.title: Leading frozen yogurt brand Frurt announces new Preston site - here's what's on the menu
articles.author: Senior Reporter
articles.summary: Frurt, a frozen yogurt parlour, is opening its 12th location in Preston next month. The new store will offer six rotating flavors of frozen yogurt, half of which are vegan, along with new menu items including hand-crafted protein and energy balls, fresh juices, and coffee.

articles.title: Adidas unveils exclusive concept store at Istanbul Airport
articles.author: Benedict Evans
articles.summary: Adidas has opened a new 245m2 concept store at Istanbul Airport, featuring a wide range of products including high-performance collections and Adidas Originals. The store, designed in collaboration with Unifree Duty Free, aligns with Adidas's 2025 growth ambitions and enhances the airport shopping experience.

articles.title: M&S fans 'conflicted' as 'intriguing' sauce with unusual flavour spotted on shelves
articles.author: Rahima Miah
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer (M&S) has launched a new Marmite and caramel sauce. The product combines sweet and savoury flavors, creating a blend of smooth caramel and Marmite, resulting in a rich, umami-laced sauce. M&S encourages shoppers to try the new product which is available for £3.

articles.title: Home Bargains reduces £40 'skincare hero' to £6 that does 'everything you need'
articles.author: Amber O'Connor
articles.summary: Home Bargains is offering significant discounts on beauty products, including the Dr. Lipp The All You Need Set reduced to £5.99, and the Dr. Lipp Was & Glow 100ml Set also for £5.99. Additionally, other brands like Fenty Hair and BareMinerals have products on sale, with the Fenty Hair The Homecurl Curl-Defining Cream 30ml reduced to £1.99.

articles.title: LG Brings Seamless, Evolving Smart Home Experiences to Europe With Thinq Ai
articles.summary: LG Electronics introduced its LG ThinQ AI platform at IFA 2025, designed to personalize and optimize the smart home appliance experience in Europe. The platform integrates ThinQ UP and ThinQ Care services, offering features like continuous software updates and proactive appliance management. LG began rolling out ThinQ AI in key European markets in September.

articles.title: 45 Cheap Product Swaps That You'll Wish You Made A Long Time Ago
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: Nortiv 8 introduces walking shoes offering comfort similar to Hokas at a lower price. Gold Bond launches a firming neck and chest cream. Good Molecules presents Pineapple Exfoliating Powder and Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel. E.l.f. offers Lash Xtndr Tubing Mascara, Soft Glam Foundation, and Glow Reviver Melting Lip Balm, while Essence introduces Drop of Sunshine Bronzing Drops. B.tan releases a self-tanner for easy application, and Sliick launches Ingrown Rescue Solution. Catrice presents "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener and Magic Shaper Face Cream Palette. Dossier introduces "Ambery Vanilla" perfume, offering a budget-friendly alternative.

articles.title: Musk's self-driving promises take a hit as Tesla reveals 'full autonomy' is still out of ...
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Tesla redefines its Full Self-Driving (FSD) system as an advanced driving system capable of performing transportation tasks providing autonomous or similar functionality under specified driving conditions. This new definition signals a change in Tesla's official paperwork regarding FSD's capabilities.

articles.title: I tried Burger King's new £11 burger and there was immediately 1 big problem
articles.author: Dianne Bourne
articles.summary: Burger King launched a new "premium" Wagyu burger in the UK for £11, made from Wagyu beef and available nationwide for a limited time. The burger was initially available exclusively on Deliveroo until September 22, and then on other delivery platforms from September 23.

articles.title: Face powder is making a comeback as Dior, Gucci and Chanel lead the way
articles.author: Carolina Malis
articles.summary: Several companies have released new or updated powder products. Luxury houses like Chanel and Guerlain have reimagined scented dusting powders. Brands like La Prairie and Tatcha offer pearl-infused formulas. Gucci's Poudre de Beauté Mat Naturel provides hydration, while Dior Forever Cushion Powder contains skin-loving extracts. Supergoop! and Colorescience offer SPF-infused powders, and By Terry has Hyaluronic powders.

articles.title: I tried Burger King's new £11 burger backed by Gordon Ramsay — there was one big problem
articles.author: Dianne Bourne
articles.summary: Burger King launched a Wagyu beef burger in the UK, priced at £11, promoted with a campaign featuring Gordon Ramsay. The burger features flame-grilled British Wagyu beef, caramelized onions, and other toppings, available for a limited time and initially exclusive to Deliveroo.

articles.title: David Lauren on Having His Father as His Boss and Letting People Live in a Ralph Lauren Ad
articles.author: Thomas Crown Affair
articles.summary: Ralph Lauren introduced "Ask Ralph," a new AI tool designed to create personal connections with customers by offering personalized style advice. The company is also exploring expanding into the hospitality sector, potentially opening Ralph Lauren-themed hotels, following the success of its coffee shops and restaurants.

articles.title: David Lauren Wants to Let People Live in a Ralph Lauren Ad
articles.author: Belinda Luscombe
articles.summary: Ralph Lauren is launching a new AI tool called "Ask Ralph" to provide customers with personalized fashion advice and create a personal connection. The tool aims to act as a 24/7 virtual Ralph Lauren, offering style guidance and helping customers make their clothing choices more personal.

articles.title: Daraz Sri Lanka Celebrates 9 Years with the 9.9 Birthday Cart Sale, bringing Prices So Low, It Feels Like a Gift
articles.summary: Daraz Sri Lanka is launching its 9.9 Birthday Cart Sale from September 9 to 20, offering discounts up to 85%, free delivery, and vouchers worth over 20 million rupees. The sale includes special offers on top brands like Bolt Gear, Spa Ceylon, and Cetaphil, along with a Best Price Guarantee in the Electronics category.

articles.title: I ate Burger King's 'posh' new £11 burger loved by Gordon Ramsay — there was one big problem
articles.author: Dianne Bourne
articles.summary: Burger King has launched a new "premium" Wagyu beef burger in the UK for £11. The burger is made from British Wagyu beef and features toppings like caramelized onions, pink pickled onions, peppery rocket, crispy onions, and caramelized onion mayo, served in a brioche bun. It is available for a limited time nationwide and via Deliveroo exclusively until September 22.

articles.title: Alibaba's Amap ranking feature is latest salvo against Meituan in China's e-commerce wars
articles.author: South China Morning Post
articles.summary: Alibaba Group launched Amap Street Stars, an AI-powered ranking feature on its Amap online mapping service, covering 300 cities and 1.6 million businesses. In response, Meituan will apply AI to screen consumer reviews and launch a 'quality food delivery' service on the Dianping app.

articles.title: Marmite launches TWO new flavours at UK supermarkets today – check where you can pick them up
articles.author: Caron Mckinlay
articles.summary: Marmite has launched two new flavors at UK supermarkets in time for Halloween and bonfires. These products are in collaboration with M&S. KitKat has launched a new Gingerbread flavor at UK stores ahead of the Christmas season, available at Sainsbury's. Greggs has launched a homeware collection.

articles.title: 'Fake News': Naval Ravikant Does Not Want Employees To Work 24/7 At His New Startup
articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: Ravikant defended his new startup, 'Impossible Computer Company,' refuting certain expectations associated with it. This implies the launch of a new company in the computer sector.

articles.title: Smart Appliances Enhancing Life After Retirement
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the 12 kg/7 kg Fully Automatic Front Load Washer. This new washing machine features AI Eco Bubble technology, Quick Drive, Super Speed modes, hygiene steam functionality, a Digital Inverter Motor with a 20-year warranty, and SmartThings integration for remote control. It also has Wrinkle Prevent and AI Control.

articles.title: A millennial selling 7-figures worth of cleaning products explains his 2-part sales strategy — and why he's betting on brick-and-mortar retail
articles.author: Kathleen Elkins
articles.summary: Alex Yale launched his eco-friendly cleaning brand, Uncle Todd's, in 2023 and uses Amazon to test the market for new products. He focuses on retail expansion, achieving placement in over 3,000 stores by 2025, including Walmart and Home Depot, emphasizing clear product descriptions on packaging, with 'Septic Pods' prominently displayed on his septic pod product.

articles.title: TRG Screen appoints Amjad Zoghbi as Head of AI, signalling a new era of intelligent market data management
articles.summary: TRG Screen appointed Amjad Zoghbi as Head of AI to lead the company's AI strategy and its integration across products, operations, and client solutions. This appointment highlights TRG Screen's focus on using AI to deliver practical innovation to clients and achieve greater efficiency, cost control, and insight in their market data operations.

articles.title: Genitalmen
articles.author: Lucy Knight
articles.summary: Several companies including Sure, Lynx, Dove, Old Spice, and Secret have recently launched whole-body deodorants. These products aim to provide freshness beyond the underarms, targeting areas like breasts, feet, and genitals. The development of these products is driven by consumer demand for all-over odor protection, and reflect a growing trend of self-care and personal hygiene.

articles.title: 'I tried Burger King's new £11 gourmet Wagyu Burger - one thing surprised me'
articles.author: Niamh Kirk
articles.summary: Burger King has launched a new Wagyu Burger in the UK, positioned as a premium offering in its Gourmet King's range. Priced at £11, the burger features 100% British Wagyu beef, flame-grilled and topped with sweet, caramelised onions. This launch introduces a gourmet burger option without the hefty price tag typically associated with Wagyu burgers.

articles.title: Hull
articles.author: BBC News
articles.summary: Salesforce is launching 'Einstein X,' an AI-powered marketing platform. This comprehensive suite of AI tools personalizes customer interactions and automates marketing campaigns. A beta program is scheduled for Q4, with a full commercial release planned for early next year.

articles.title: New Scalable Delivery Software Solution YOVOY Launches to Give UK Businesses Direct Access to Virtual Fleet
articles.author: Pressat
articles.summary: YOVOY launched on September 10th, 2025, offering a scalable, same-day, on-demand delivery solution to UK businesses. This virtual delivery fleet aims to address issues like delays and damaged goods, providing a faster and cheaper delivery option.

articles.title: 联泓新科：固态电池关键功能材料已开始形成批量销售_手机网易网
articles.author: 财联社
articles.summary: 联泓卫蓝 has developed and begun mass sales of key functional materials for new solid-state and semi-solid-state batteries. The company is closely following the development trends in the new energy industry.

articles.title: Driving Innovation: How LOCKTHESMITH is Transforming Its Industry
articles.author: Charlotte Mckinsey
articles.summary: LOCKTHESMITH has introduced customizable smart lock systems featuring biometric authentication, mobile app integration, and AI-assisted diagnostics. The company is also developing AI-powered diagnostic systems and eco-friendly lock solutions. These innovations aim to modernize locksmithing by integrating technology and sustainability into security solutions.

articles.title: I ate Burger King's new £11 burger loved by Gordon Ramsay — I had 1 big problem
articles.author: Dianne Bourne
articles.summary: Burger King has launched a new "premium" Wagyu beef burger in the UK, priced at £11. The burger features 100% British Wagyu beef, flame-grilled and topped with various ingredients, and is marketed as a first of its kind for quick-service restaurants in the UK, even featuring celebrity chef Gordon Ramsay in its advertising.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Discover diverse Latin flavors at Johnston's restaurant week
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: T-Mobile has invested billions to improve its network across various areas. As a result, Ookla Speedtest has recognized T-Mobile as America's best mobile network in the US.

articles.title: Samsung Bespoke AI Jet Ultra Complete Extra vacuum cleaner review: Is this lightweight £1,000 vacuum cleaner really worth the money? Here's what I really think of Samsung's latest cordless model
articles.author: DANIELLE AMATO
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Bespoke AI Jet Ultra Complete Extra, a cordless vacuum cleaner featuring a self-emptying 'CleanStation' dock and AI-powered floor type detection. The vacuum includes multiple accessories and two batteries, aiming to rival Dyson in the high-end market. While offering excellent cleaning performance and convenient features, its high price point may be a barrier for the average consumer.

articles.title: AI+LIFE HACKS丨Grand Opening of Zhongshan Sam's Club Store_中山Plus_中山+中山Plus（中山+）-中山城市客户端
articles.summary: Sam's Club officially opened its 57th store in China in Zhongshan on September 10th. The store features 3,000-4,000 differentiated products, including approximately 60 exclusive 'Originating from Zhongshan' or 'Made in Zhongshan' items, and several new products making their national debut. Customers can also purchase over 1,000 products through the Sam's Club app, with one-hour delivery available in certain areas.

articles.title: Hyundai: N Brand Holds The Key To Becoming 'Most Respected' Performance Manufacturer
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Hyundai is developing future N and N Line models. These models aim to redefine the brand's identity through enhanced performance.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Londonderry secures multiple new patents in technology sector
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: T-Mobile is highlighted for investing billions to improve its network and being recognized as America's best mobile network in the US by Ookla Speedtest. Electronics for Imaging, Inc. has also been assigned multiple patents, demonstrating technological advancements.

articles.title: Syria launches first digital application licensed by Ministry of Information
articles.author: Reem
articles.summary: The 'Green Pages' application, the first officially licensed digital app in Syria, has launched in Idlib. Developed by Syrian entrepreneur Samer Said Issa, the app aims to connect businesses and consumers, offering access to essential services and streamlining commercial activities. It plans to expand across all Syrian provinces after initially covering Idlib.

articles.title: Thin Iphone, New Design, Hardly Ai: How Innovative Is Apple?
articles.author: Tagesschau
articles.summary: Apple introduced new devices. Competition currently offers more sophisticated AI functions than recent iPhones.

articles.title: 2021 holds even more Samsung foldables
articles.author: Techcrunch
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Z Flip and Z Fold 2 after addressing issues from the initial Galaxy Fold. These newer devices represent improvements and updates to Samsung's foldable phone line.

articles.title: Nikon's first RED co-brand is the Nikon ZR
articles.author: David Imel
articles.summary: Nikon has unveiled the ZR, a co-branded camera with RED, featuring RED R3D NE file recording. Based on the Nikon Z6III, the ZR will be available on October 20th for $2,199.

articles.title: Six projects, six decades – 60 years of Wolff Olins' creative excellence
articles.author: Emma Barratt
articles.summary: Wolff Olins helped launch First Direct, a phone-based bank, with a bold new brand identity. They also created a radical consumer brand for Orange, simplifying and humanizing the technology sector.  Recently, Wolff Olins reimagined Benefit's beauty branding, embracing humor and playfulness.

articles.title: These games have arrived today
articles.summary: Microsoft has ended its Xbox partner program affecting website operators. The Xbox Store is expected to release new games like 'Battlefield 6,' 'Borderlands 4,' 'DOOM: The Dark Ages,' and 'EA SPORTS FC 26', catering to various gaming preferences.

articles.title: Katrina Kaif's Kay Beauty debuts in UK, hits Space NK
articles.summary: Kay Beauty, Katrina Kaif's makeup line in association with Nykaa, has launched in the UK at Space NK, marking the first Indian-founded beauty brand to be featured there. The launch includes 197 products for lips, eyes, and face, including bestsellers like the Hydra Creme Lipstick and Hydrating Foundation.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Cecil County plans significant economic development near Perryville
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: T-Mobile has invested billions to enhance its network, extending coverage from major cities to smaller towns. According to Ookla Speedtest, T-Mobile is recognized as America's best mobile network in the US.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Argue Less and Talk More with Communication Expert Jefferson Fisher and 11 more events
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: T-Mobile has invested billions to improve its network, resulting in it being recognized as America's best mobile network in the US, according to Ookla Speedtest.

articles.title: Top Front Load Washing Machines Powered by Smart AI Tech
articles.summary: Multiple washing machine models are introduced, each equipped with AI-powered features such as Swirl Wash, EcoBubble, and Direct Drive technology. They also include functionalities like Steam Refresh, Hygiene Steam, and Ozone Technology for enhanced cleaning and fabric care. The models emphasize efficiency with Eco Inverter and Digital Inverter technologies.

articles.title: Talavera Solutions Launches the PromptShelf.ai Platform to Transform Professional Productivity by Facilitating AI Prompt Management
articles.author: Gabriel Arce
articles.summary: Talavera Solutions launched PromptShelf.ai, a new platform designed to democratize access to generative AI and boost productivity through intelligent prompt management. The platform provides a centralized hub where users can store, search, collaborate on, and refine their AI prompts.

articles.title: 'From Classic Maki to Bold Flavor Combinations, Sozo Izakaya's Sushi Menu Redefines Japanese Dining in Versova'
articles.author: Sourav
articles.summary: Sozo Izakaya, located in Mumbai, has launched a new sushi menu featuring a variety of rolls. The menu includes options like Avocado Maki, Crab Avocado, Veg Dynamite, Shrimp Dynamite, Sozo Veg Maki, and Sozo Shrimp Maki, alongside other innovative combinations like Sweet Paprika Cream Cheese Roll, Spicy Salmon Avocado Roll, and Tori Maki.

articles.title: SEO Services Near Me ~ Grow Your Business Locally
articles.summary: The Digital Curve, an SEO company in Ghaziabad, provides SEO services including local, on-page, off-page, and technical SEO. Their services are designed to help businesses rank higher on Google and attract local customers, boosting website traffic and generating quality leads.

articles.title: 스웨덴 보건장관, 기자회견 중 갑자기 쓰러져… 직접 밝힌 ‘원인'은?
articles.author: Health Chosun
articles.summary: Nexa introduces 'Spray It, Leave It, Done,' a product designed to make dirt vanish effortlessly. The product's name suggests ease of use and effectiveness in removing dirt.

articles.title: Alibaba's Amap ranking feature is latest salvo against Meituan in China's e-commerce wars
articles.author: Ann Cao
articles.summary: Alibaba Group launched 'Amap Street Stars,' an AI-powered ranking feature on its Amap mapping service. The service will rank offline destinations like restaurants and hotels in over 300 cities, recommending 1.6 million local businesses based on navigation patterns and user reviews. This launch intensifies Alibaba's competition with Meituan in the lifestyle services market.

articles.title: Amazon Fashion launches a custom clothing service, Made for You
articles.author: Techcrunch
articles.summary: Amazon is launching a new service called 'Made for You', enabling customers to design custom T-shirts based on their specific measurements.

articles.title: AI Podcast Startup Sets Off Disruption: 5,000 Shows, 3,000 Episodes Weekly at Just $1 Each
articles.author: Elisabeta Qoku
articles.summary: Inception Point AI is launching a service to produce podcasts using generative AI at a cost of $1 per episode. This service aims to democratize podcasting and enable businesses to leverage branded podcasts more affordably. The company plans to produce 5,000 podcasts and 3,000 episodes every week.

articles.title: 港股新消费概念股震荡走弱，老铺黄金跌超6%_手机网易网
articles.author: 每日经济新闻
articles.summary: Lao Pu Gold's stock fell by more than 6%, Pop Mart's stock decreased by more than 5%, and Nayuki's Tea and Weilong Food stocks both experienced declines exceeding 2% in Hong Kong.

articles.title: 49 Amazon Must-Haves From A Professional Shopper
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: Pavoi launches chunky bejeweled statement earrings for the holiday season. Clinique offers Black Honey and Pink Honey Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balms with a touch of gloss. Venus Visage introduces Teeth Whitening Pens as an alternative to Crest Whitestrips, while Catrice releases "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener in four shades. Billie launches Soothe Comforting Body Wash with oat milk and ceramides. Capri Blue releases Volcano-scented multipurpose cleaner. Eos presents Crème de Pistachio Better Body Lotion. Sol de Janeiro launches Brazilian Bum Bum Cream with scent notes of vanilla, pistachio, and salted caramel.

articles.title: Mercedes-Benz Baby G SUV to debut with unique design, electric option likely
articles.author: HT Auto Desk
articles.summary: Mercedes-Benz is planning to launch a new SUV called 'Baby G,' designed to be a more urban-friendly and potentially all-electric vehicle. It aims to capture the aspirational value of the G-Class in a more compact and accessible package, targeting a younger demographic and expanding the 'G' family lineup.

articles.title: When AI agents rewrite the rules of brand leadership
articles.summary: Hindustan Unilever Limited (HUL) is incorporating AI into its operations to deliver personalized experiences, such as AI-enabled skin and hair analyzers. Zepto is launching 'Zepto Atom', an AI suite which enables the marketers to run interactive sessions with virtual customers for precision campaigns in real time.

articles.title: 39 Travel Products To Help You Get From A To B With As Little Agony As Possible
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: The article highlights a series of new product and service introductions and launches for travelers. Some examples include a wireless transmitter for headphones, vegan leather luggage tags, a universal phone holder, Sea Bands, Tide sink packs, a teeny-tiny razor, a digital luggage scale, a teeny-tiny trashcan, Sriracha packets, a bendy pillow, anti-blister balm, an Altoids tin pill insert, an LED neck reading light, a blind-spot mirror, a 2-in-1 hair tool, a foldable hair dryer, a hardcover travel journal, Neutrogena makeup remover towelettes, a cocktail tin, packing cubes, seat gap fillers, quick-dry water shoes, anti-pickpocketing clips, a windshield cleaning mop, Cadence Capsules, LeakLocks Toiletry Skins, travel bottles, Bounce wrinkle release spray, a hanging diffuser, a makeup pen, a Hairbrella, a convertible duffel bag, a hair tie keychain, Munchkin snack catchers, a luggage strap, a refillable soap dispenser, a portable air compressor, a universal power adapter, and a travel voltage converter.

articles.title: Eye Mo unveils fresh new look — same trusted relief for every Filipino
articles.summary: Eye Mo has launched refreshed packaging that is fresh, modern, nature-inspired and globally unified. The new packaging design reflects both the brand's heritage and its vision for the future and is available in all leading drugstores nationwide. The redesigned packaging aims to solidify Eye Mo's place as a global eye care leader as the company continues to expand across international markets.

articles.title: All the Dyson Hair Tools You'll Ever Need (2025)
articles.author: Boutayna Chokrane
articles.summary: In 2016, Dyson launched the Supersonic, its first hair dryer. Following this, Dyson introduced a range of hair tools, including stylers, straighteners, the Airwrap, and a compact blow dryer.

articles.title: You'll Get A Lot Of Use Out Of These 31 Things
articles.author: Lily Burrill
articles.summary: iRobot is offering an Alexa-compatible Roomba for automated cleaning; Calpak promotes a Laptop Tote Bag with organizational features; Revlon features an oil-absorbing volcanic face roller; Brumate presents a leakproof stainless-steel cup, and Kitsch promotes heatless hair curler. Other new products include a veggie chopper, unbreakable plates, The Clean Ball, Swedish dishcloths, Swiffer mop pads, glass storage containers, Makeup Eraser, Nippies silicone pasties, sockless shoe liners, silicone trivets, Globbles, nonstick pan, mini spatulas, seamless thongs, Dreo oscillating tower fan, crack weeder tool, Coop Home Goods pillow, Pink Stuff cleaning paste and a Kindle Paperwhite with improved features.

articles.title: Tesla owner in distress after innocent mistake causes damage to vehicle: 'Suggestions?'
articles.author: Robert Crow
articles.summary: Tesla's white seats in their vehicles are reportedly susceptible to staining from clothing, leading to customer dissatisfaction, and the Tesla service center has denied warranty coverage for this issue. Additionally, Tesla launched its autonomous-driving robotaxi service this summer in Austin, Texas, and has expanded it to more cars and locations.

articles.title: Microsoft Develops AI Stylist Tool for Ralph Lauren
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: Ralph Lauren launched "Ask Ralph," a new AI-powered shopping experience in their app, developed using Microsoft's AI tools. This tool provides personalized styling recommendations to users based on conversational queries, matching items from Polo Ralph Lauren's inventory. The system interprets tone and intent to dynamically refine recommendations, adapting to contextual cues like location and event-driven needs.

articles.title: News Analysis: AI sweeps consumer electronics, reshaping everyday life
articles.author: Source: Xinhua
articles.summary: Several companies including Haier, Hisense, Bosch, and Siemens, are introducing new AI-powered appliances at IFA, such as washing machines that recognize stains and ovens that suggest recipes. NexLawn unveiled a smart yard-care robot, while uCloudlink debuted PetPhone, a wearable for pets that initiates calls and monitors health. These new products and services aim to enhance daily life by automating tasks and improving connectivity through AI.

articles.title: This cloud storage doesn't hand over your data to AI - and costs less than ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Proton is offering a notable deal on its secure cloud storage service. This promotion suggests an emphasis on attracting new users or highlighting enhancements to the existing Proton cloud storage service.

articles.title: LG's Transparent and Massive Digital Signage Headlines New Tokyo Commercial District (LG Corp)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: LG Electronics is introducing its Transparent OLED Signage and Micro LED display in Japan. These advanced display technologies are aimed at redefining retail and urban experience marketing.

articles.title: Everything Unveiled at Apple's 'Awe Dropping' Event, Including a New iPhone Air and AirPods 3
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: The company has revealed several upgrades to its core products. These upgrades represent improvements to existing offerings.

org: North Jakarta Industry, Trade, Cooperatives, Small and Medium Enterprises Sub-agency

articles.title: Apple has unveiled its iPhone 17 line-up, including the first iPhone Air. Here's what's new
articles.author: Stuff
articles.summary: A tech giant has unveiled four new models. These models are the latest additions to the company's marquee product line.

articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Zest AI's Director of Product, Kal Koul, will introduce LuLu, a new product designed to facilitate fast and accurate lending decisions, on September 23 at 2 PM ET.

articles.author: Arabian Business
articles.summary: Microsoft supports a new AI assistant. The AI assistant helps users shop based on recipes, dietary preferences, and cooking inspirations.

articles.title: ‘Game changer' viral gel-cream moisturiser that reduces wrinkles in seven days
articles.author: The Mirror
articles.summary: A US skincare brand launched in the UK. The brand's lightweight moisturizer is proving popular due to its wrinkle-reducing results.

articles.summary: LG Electronics is introducing next-generation retail experiences at TAKANAWA Gateway City's NEWoMan TAKANAWA. The company is showcasing advanced display technologies, including Transparent OLED and Micro LED, to redefine retail and urban experience marketing.

articles.title: Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero Gets New Trailer Showcasing Switch and Switch 2 Gameplay, Features
articles.author: Gaming Bolt
articles.summary: Bandai Namco has released a new trailer for Dragon Ball: Sparking! ZERO, showcasing the anime arena fighter's performance on Nintendo Switch. The release date for the Nintendo Switch version is set for November 14.

articles.title: KUNDAL Unveils ‘10X Caffeine Strengthening Scalp Serum' -A Targeted Breakthrough in At-Home Hair Care
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: KUNDAL has launched the 10X Caffeine Strengthening Scalp Serum, designed for professional scalp care at home. The product is now available for purchase on Amazon.
